resources.string: Do you want to import these files into your library or delete them from the device irrevocably?
Do you want to import this file into your library or delete it from the device irrevocably?
In the device storage %1$d files were found that are not displayed in your library because they were deleted from your library or were not imported completely.
In the device storage 1 file was found that is not displayed in your library because it was deleted from your library or it was not imported completely.
Do you want to display this content in your library again or to delete it completely and permanently?
In the past, you hid content from your library, but this was not permanently deleted from your ${CLOUD_NAME}.
Are you sure you want to delete the entry?

"To bookmark the current website, tap the %1$s icon at the top of the screen.
On any website, you can also tap and hold the %2$s icon next to the URL field to add and remove a bookmark."
Your requested download cannot be completed. File format not supported!
The description of this error could not be found
%1$d titles were added to your collection \"%2$s\".
No titles were added to your collection \"%1$s\".
1 book was successfully added to your collection \"%1$s\".
Deleting a collection does not delete the actual titles themselves. These are still available in the library.
%1$d titles were removed from your collection \"%2$s\", but are still available in your library.
No titles were removed from your collection \"%1$s\".
1 title was removed from your collection \"%1$s\", but is still available in your library.
Deleting titles from a collection does not delete the actual titles. These are still available in the library.
This title is already in the collection.
All these titles are already in the collection \"%1$s\".
%1$d books have been already in this collection
1 book was already in the collection
This book was already in the collection
This collection is empty. Would you like to add content from your library now?
A collection called \"%1$s\" already exists. Please enter a different name.
There are currently no books in your library to add.
There are currently no books in your library that you could add to this collection.
No collections have been created. Collections make it easier for you to organize your titles.
To do this, start setting up your tolino eReader now.
Your books are not displayed because they are all marked as \"read\".
You can show them in your library again.
To show them again, please tap the view icon %1$s.
You may own books you can show by synchronizing your library %1$s.
"Why not browse our shop? You're sure to find something there."
"Hint: Why not browse our shop? You're sure to find something there."
Interested in discovering something new? Browse our shop.
"Hint: Set up your tolino eReader and then browse your bookseller's shop."
The selected content will be permanently deleted from this eReader, the ${CLOUD_NAME} and from all devices on which your library is synchronized.
Selected content will be deleted from this device. Content stored in the cloud will not be deleted.
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this content?
You will not be able to download it again later.

"The ${CLOUD_NAME} offers you maximum freedom, mobility, and security.
Store eBooks and more content online, conveniently manage them, and access them from anywhere – whether from your ${PRODUCT_NAME} eReader, smart phone, tablet or computer."
"Rakuten Kobo Inc. 135 Liberty Street Suite 101 Toronto, ON M6K 1A7 Canada"
Note: This URL has already been bookmarked. Please change the URL to create a bookmark.
Do you want to reset your device now?
Resetting this eReader will delete your personal settings, collections, bookmarks and notes.
All data (e.g. books, collections, personal settings and passwords) will be deleted from your device.
Updated versions of the dictionaries \"%1$s\" are available. Would you like to download them now?
Updated versions of the dictionaries \"%1$s\" are, however, available. Would you like to download them now?
An updated version of the dictionary \"%1$s\" is available. Would you like to download it now?
An updated version of the dictionary \"%1$s\" is, however, available. Would you like to download it now?
The file could not be found. It may have been moved or removed from the file system.
An error occurred while loading your file. The file is presumably damaged and cannot be opened.
The numerical codes entered do not match. Please repeat your entry.
If you mark a book as \"read\", it is automatically added to the \"Read books\" collection.
You have not yet configured your eReader to do this. First go to the start page and tap on “setup”.
You have not yet configured your eReader for this. To start configuring it, tap \"Setup\".

"If you return this book it will be deleted from your library.
Do you want to return it now?"
This book cannot be opened. If you would like to read this book, please log in to your account with the bookseller where you bought the book. You will then find the book in your library.
Document is Telekom encrypted, but no decryption keys are available.
Please try again or restart your eReader.
Please first exit the demo mode.
Please log in with your Thalia account again.
Please log in with your Thalia account again.
You have been logged out by the system.
You have been logged out by the system.
You have been logged out by the system.
You have been logged out by the system.
You have been logged out by the system.
You have been logged out by the system.
You have been logged out by the system.
You have been logged out by the system.
Unfortunately you do not have rights required for this operation.
An error occurred while processing. Please try again.
Adobe (DRM) is reporting an error. Please try again.
Error while uploading to the tolino Cloud
POST: A demo user attempted to register a device. / DELETE: The transmitted hardware type is unknown. Permitted types: “html5”, “device”.
An error occurred while uploading the file. Please try again.
The file could not be found.
An error occurred during removal. Please try again.
An error occurred during removal. Please try again.
An error occurred while loading. Please try again or synchronize your content.
The content is no longer available.
Error while uploading to the tolino Cloud
Error while uploading to the tolino Cloud
The content is too large. The available storage space has been exceeded.
Error while uploading to the tolino Cloud
Please upload either an EPUB or PDF.
Please try again or restart your eReader.
Adobe (DRM) is reporting an error. Please try again.
Error while uploading to the tolino Cloud
Please try again or contact customer service.
Error while uploading to the tolino Cloud
Please try again or contact customer service.
Error while uploading to the tolino Cloud
See message. As the case may be, someone tried to cancel the delivery executed via CDP. These deliveries can only be deleted via CDP.
Please try again or contact customer service.
You are already linked to this book shop.
You can only perform one library link at any one time.
You cannot log out, because you are not logged in.
You cannot perform any library links at this time.
Have you perhaps written your username incorrectly? Please try again.
You could not be logged out. Please try again or restart your eReader.
You cannot link together two user accounts at the same book shop.
The selected book shop does not currently allow any library links.
To remove a device, you must be logged in with the same user account with which you have also performed the library link.
Please try again or restart your eReader.
Please try again or restart your eReader.
Please try again or restart your eReader.
You cannot register any more devices. To register a new device, please first go to device management and remove a device.
You cannot register any more devices. To register a new device, please first go to device management and remove a device.
Please log your tolino eReader in again.
Please try again or contact customer service.
Please check whether the eBook has already been deleted.
You have yet not purchased this content.
Please try again or restart your eReader.
Please try again or restart your eReader.
The content protected by Adobe DRM could not be opened. Please sign on in the user settings under \"Adobe DRM\" and try again.

The content protected by Adobe DRM could not be loaded. The Adobe ID does not match the one saved in the ${PRODUCT_NAME}. Please check the settings on your ${PRODUCT_NAME} to determine which Adobe ID you have saved.

The content protected by Adobe DRM could not be loaded because the download period has expired. Please verify whether the date and time are correctly set. If the problem persists, please download the file again from your provider.
The book could not be loaded. Please verify whether the read permission has expired and whether the date and time are correctly set. If the problem persists, please contact the service hotline.
An error occurred while accessing the file. Please download the ACSM file again and repeat the process. If this error reoccurs, please contact your service hotline.
This borrowed book is protected with Adobe DRM and has already been returned. It can therefore no longer be opened.
Please verify whether your Internet connection is blocked by a firewall and that the date and time are set correctly.
The content could not be loaded because of an Adobe DRM error. Please check the settings to see which Adobe ID you have saved. If your cannot resolve the error, please contact your service hotline.
A connection error occurred indicating that your date and time settings are incorrect. Please set the correct date and time, and try again (later).
The entire document could not be downloaded. Please try again, or contact customer service.
A file could not be found. Please try again later or contact customer services.
The file could not be found. Please try again later or contact customer service.
System error. Please restart your eReader.
An error occurred during transfer. Please try again later or contact customer services.
An error has occurred. Please try again later, or contact customer service.
The destination URL is invalid. Please try again later or contact customer services.
A connection error has occurred. Please try again later or contact customer service.
Display error. Please reopen your eBook.
An error occurred while uploading or accessing encrypted data. Please try again later or contact customer services.

Unable to load selected eBook. Please synchronize your content in the library. If you are still unable to load your eBook, please contact customer service. For details on how to do so, please look under \"User manual and help\" in the menu.
An error has occurred. Your ${BRAND_NAME} user account has been logged out. The libraries can therefore not be linked. Please log in again and then try again.

"The file format of the title is not entirely supported by your ${PRODUCT_NAME} eReader. Errors are in particular likely to occur when opening titles that contain multimedia content. Do you want to open this title now?"

"An error has occurred during the configuration.
You can configure your ${PRODUCT_NAME} later."
This functionality is not available on your device. Please install it first.
An unexpected error occurred. Please try again (later).

The borrowed book cannot be opened because the associated lending information is missing from your device. Please always load books from lending libraries directly onto the eReader with which you want to read them.

"The lending period for this borrowed book has been exceeded. You can therefore no longer read it.
Would you like to delete this book from your library?"
Incorrect e-mail address or password. Please make sure you entered this information correctly, and remember that it is case-sensitive.

"Registering your ${PRODUCT_NAME} eReader would result in you exceeding the maximum number of 5 devices permitted per user account. In the next step, you can deregister devices in order to continue to register your eReader."
The borrowed book cannot be opened because the associated lending information is missing. Please always download books from lending libraries directly onto your eReader.
Your ${PRODUCT_NAME} could not connect to the HotSpot. Please try again later or choose another WLAN network.
Your ${PRODUCT_NAME} could not be connected to the Internet. Please check your WLAN settings.
Your ${PRODUCT_NAME} could not connect to the ${PRODUCT_NAME} server. Please call up the WLAN settings and connect again.
Your ${PRODUCT_NAME} could not connect to the internet. Please call up the WLAN settings and connect again.
Cannot find a known WLAN network. Please check the WLAN settings.
WLAN is disabled. Please go to the settings to enable WLAN.
Memory card cannot be accessed. Please make sure a memory card is inserted in your device.
The book \"%1$s\" could not be loaded due to insufficient space. Please make additional space available, or insert an SD card to be able to load the title.
Unfortunately there is not enough memory available. Please delete content from your library or from the list of dictionaries. Afterwards you can store the dictionary on your eReader.
Unfortunately there is not enough memory available. Please delete files from your library. Afterwards you can store content on your eReader again.
The process can therefore not be completed. Please try again (later).
Server response cannot be analyzed. Please try again later. Please contact customer service if this problem occurs again.
Your ${PRODUCT_NAME} eReader has been logged out. Please sign in again to be able to download content.
Server response cannot be analyzed. Please try again later. Please contact customer service if this problem occurs again.
The content cannot be downloaded from the Cloud, because it was deleted.
Please check the Internet connection, or try again later.
A system component is currently unavailable. Please try again later, or contact customer service.
A system error has occurred. Please try again later, or contact customer service.
The download of the software update was disrupted. Please make sure your ${PRODUCT_NAME} is connected to the internet and continue the download.
The storage location for the update file could not be found. Please try again later. Please contact customer service if this problem reoccurs.
The checksum for the downloaded software update is incorrect. Please make sure that your ${PRODUCT_NAME} is connected to the Internet and restart the download.
"Please note that when a new user signs in, the following information is irrevocably deleted: • Your personal settings • Your created collections • Not in the ${CLOUD_NAME} saved books"
" • The authorization of your ${PRODUCT_NAME} to open Adobe DRM protected files will be canceled"
In the menu you find all settings and extras for your device.
This private area shows your latest reading activity.
Here you see the recommendations from your bookseller and can directly purchase them.
Swipe to the right or tap in this area to turn a page back.
Swipe to the left or tap in this area to turn a page forwards.
Tap the area in the middle to open the menu and personalise the reader mode as you wish.
Further information can be found in the manual in your library.
Pressing the home button will get you back to the starting page at any time.
Reading – wherever and however you enjoy it

"There are no books in your library.
Browse the books in our store!"
Register your ${PRODUCT_NAME} now in just a few steps and experience the world of digital reading, wherever, whenever and however you like.
Changes to directory structure. Please wait.
You have %1$d books by this author
You have one book by this author
You have one book with no author information
You have %1$d books with no author information
There are %1$d books in this collection
There is one book in this collection
"1 / 3 Adobe DRM protected title will open. Obtain permission."
"2 / 3 Adobe DRM protected title will open. Authorization from www.adobe.com."
"3 / 3 Adobe DRM protected title will load"
The requested title is being added to your library.
Your excerpt is being added to the library.
If you exit the registration process, your previous entries will be lost.
If you exit the registration step, you will not be able to use all of the functions. This will be possible only once you have registered.
In just a few seconds, the books in your ${BRAND_NAME} library will be available.
Please reference our website if you have additional questions on synchronizing your library.
The search was canceled due to an unknown error.
The search was canceled due to no Internet connection.
Your search resulted in no hits in your library.
The authorisation of your ${PRODUCT_NAME} to open Adobe DRM protected files will be canceled
Please note that the following information will be permanently deleted when a new user signs in:

Link your ${BRAND_NAME} library to the libraries of other book sellers from which you have already bought titles. Once you have linked your libraries, all your titles will be available in a single library and on all your devices.
You can unlink the libraries at any time.
Change the shop for this device
You are logged in with your %s account.
You are still not logged in.
With the following Adobe ID your %1$s is successfully enabled to display Adobe DRM protected content.
Some books are protected with Adobe DRM against unauthorized opening. To display this books on your %1$s, you need to authorize your %2$s with your Adobe ID.
Authorization of your ${PRODUCT_NAME} failed. Please make sure you entered your user name and password correctly and check your network connection.
The authorization for your ${PRODUCT_NAME} eReader with Adobe failed. Please check the data you entered and your network connection.
Now you can display Adobe DRM protected content.
Authorization of your ${PRODUCT_NAME} could not be canceled. Please check your network connection.
With the registration of this device, you will exceed the allowed maximum of 6 devices. Please contact the customer care of Adobe Systems Ltd.
Please enter a valid user name and password.
Please enter a valid user name and password.
You can get a free Adobe ID from
Open the page on a computer or mobile device with an Internet connection (not on your %1$s).
You have the possibility to change the shop on your tolino eReader. Herefore please reset your device to factory settings.
Note: when resetting all data (e.g. books, collections, personal settings and passwords) will be deleted from your device.
Recommendation: Save your titles in the ${CLOUD_NAME} and easily connect your libraries at different booksellers afterwards.
"Unable to download items. If you would like to try again, please go to your library and tap the books in question."
"Unable to download %1$d items. If you would like to try again, please go to your library and tap the books in question."

"Unable to download one item.
If you would like to try again, please go to your library and tap the book in question."
Your %1$d books have been successfully downloaded from the ${CLOUD_NAME}.
Your book has been successfully downloaded from the ${CLOUD_NAME}.
The book you have selected is too large to upload.
"No books couldn't be saved in the ${CLOUD_NAME}."
"%1$d books couldn't be saved in the ${CLOUD_NAME}."
"1 book couldn't be saved in the ${CLOUD_NAME}."
Your %1$d titles have been successfully backed up to the ${CLOUD_NAME}.
Your title has been successfully backed up to the ${CLOUD_NAME}.

"Switching the USB connection mode requires a restart.
Operating system note: In Windows, the enhanced USB connection mode works starting with Windows XP. If you are working in OS X, you will need the program “Android File Transfer” to exchange data. You can find this program and additional data at: http://www.android.com/filetransfer"
If you switch the USB connection mode you will need to restart your tolino.
Choose between standard mass storrage mode and enhanced mode (MTP). MTP enables you to use your ${PRODUCT_NAME} while it is connected to a computer via USB.
After five hours in sleep mode your eReader will turn itself off.

"You can increase the brightness of your screen beyond the normal level. However, the difference is barely perceptible in well-lit surroundings, and in the dark the screen will be too bright. It also reduces battery life. Would you like to increase brightness anyway?"
Color temperature is automatically adjusted throughout the day.
The reading light lets you read comfortably in any lighting conditions. You can turn the reading light on and off using the light button at the top right of your device.
Adjust the intensity of the screen light.
The numerical code has been successfully changed.
The numerical code has been successfully saved.
Protect your ${PRODUCT_NAME} from unauthorized use by setting a numeric password.
Set how often you want the screen to refresh while reading.
Data on the device memory, personal settings and passwords will be deleted.
Your personal settings, collections, bookmarks and notes will be deleted.
Set the period of inactivity after which the device is put to sleep.
To turn the page, lightly tap the back of the device.
Get current time from the Internet.
Set the device date and time.
To deactivate the numerical code, first enter your current code. The deactivation will permanently delete this code.
To change your numerical code, first enter your current code and confirm your entry by tipping on the check mark %1$s on the key pad.
Activate the numerical code by entering a 4-digit numerical code in the fields. Confirm your entry by tapping on the check mark %1$s on the key pad.
Enter a new 4-digit numerical code in the fields and confirm your entry by tipping on the check mark %1$s on the key pad.
"http://%1$s:%2$s Increases power consumption in standby mode."
The download of your dictionary was unexpectedly interrupted. Please make sure that your ${PRODUCT_NAME} is connected to the internet and continue the download.
A more recent version of the dictionary is available. Would you like to update the dictionary now?
Selected dictionaries will be deleted from your ${PRODUCT_NAME} but can be downloaded from the cloud again any time you wish.
No dictionaries were downloaded. Please synchronize your ${PRODUCT_NAME} so all available dictionaries can be displayed.
No new books were added to your library.
1 book was successfully added to your library.
%1$s books were successfully added to your library.
1 font has been successfully added and is now available for use.
%1$s fonts have been successfully added and are now available for use.
1 font could not be added. It may be damaged.
%1$s fonts could not be added. They may be damaged.
1 book and 1 font have been successfully added to your library and are now available for use.
%1$s books and 1 font have been successfully added to your library and are now available for use.
1 book and %1$s fonts have been successfully added to your library and are now available for use.
%1$s books and %2$s fonts have been successfully added to your library and are now available for use.
Experience the many benefits of your eReader. Simply establish a connection to the WLAN, register, and you’re ready to roll.
If you want to use the Internet, please first enable WLAN.
Your device is in flight mode and therefore cannot connect to the Internet.
No WLAN? Set up eReader later.
An error has occurred. Check your connection and password.
Turn WLAN on first before you can connect to the Internet. Tap on \"On\".
"Tap on one of the networks in the list. Use %1$s to update the list."
Now you will be redirected from the browser directly to the ${PRODUCT_NAME} App Shop…
The date of the security certificate for this website is not valid.

"The secure transfer of payment data cannot be guaranteed with the credit card you have registered. The payment process was therefore cancelled. You will incur no charges. Please select a different payment method for your purchase."
The security certificate for this website has expired.
The security certificate for this website is not valid.
The name of the site does not match the name on the certificate.
The security certificate for this website is not yet valid.
The security certificate for this website has errors.
The security certificate for this website is not trusted.
There are problems with the security certificate for this site.
This PDF cannot be converted into a text document. The operation will therefore be canceled.
The update has been reset. Your software version is up to date.
Before starting the update-procedure please ensure that the battery of your ${PRODUCT_NAME} is ${BATTERY_THRESHOLD_UPDATE} % charged and that the internet connection is not disrupted.
The following functions and improvements will be available after you update to version %1$s:
No description of the changes available.
Please update your ${PRODUCT_NAME} immediately to ensure system stability.
To have even more fun with your ${PRODUCT_NAME}, please download the update.
The ${PRODUCT_NAME} will be restored to factory settings. After rebooting, enter your user name and password again to reload your books from the cloud into your library.
A software update is available for your ${PRODUCT_NAME}
Version %1$s will be downloaded and then installed.
"It's charging and you can share content. Please eject it from your computer if you want to continue reading or shopping."
Please also eject the second memory on your computer if you want to continue reading or shopping.
Your ${PRODUCT_NAME} is now connected to your computer via USB.
You have disconneccted your ${PRODUCT_NAME} or a therein contained micro-SD card from your computer.

"There are no entries in your notes directory.
Once you have set a bookmark, marked a spot in the text, or added a note, it will be listed here."
No bookmarks have been set. To set a bookmark, tap the bookmark icon at the top right of the page you are currently reading.
Unfortunately, there is no table of contents.
Do you want to open the URL %1$s in the web browser of your eReader?

Would you like to mark this book as finished? Important note: Titles you have marked as finished will not be displayed in your library. You can find your finished books in the collection \"finished books\".
You are on page %1$s. We found a newer reading position from another device page %2$s.
"There is no dictionary available. Dictionaries must be downloaded before the first use. You can do this in the dictionary overview. Would you like to switch now to dictionary overview?"
Dictionary %s is not available. Would you like to use one of the dictionaries that has already been downloaded?
No language has been defined for this title. Do you want to use one of the dictionaries that has already been downloaded?
Dictionary %s has not been downloaded. Would you like to use one of the dictionaries that has already been downloaded?
With a \"long press\", a somewhat longer finger press on a word, you get access to highlighting and notes as well as reference and translation dictionaries.

"Change the font display in the reading settings %1$s. Choose from six optimized fonts, or install your own favorite font. To quickly browse through a book, swipe from the left or right edge of the screen to the center and keep your finger pressed down on the screen."
An error occurred while loading your file. The file is presumably damaged and cannot be opened. Please contact customer service.
The PDF document does not contain plain text. Shown text may be part of images.
Unfortunately, your search resulted in no hits.
Your search term must contain at least 3 characters.
Would you like to continue anyway?
